channel.title: Devion's Realm , my first server
channel.description:
Supsup you guys? Most of you don't know me , that's because i'm fairly new at all this coding stuff. I started coding about 1 month ago.
anyways , lets get to the credits and such...
[center] here's the base's information: [b]Base used:[/b] Exion's PI Base [b]Protocol:[/b] 317
Credits: [b]I Am Sanity[/b] and [b]Exion[/b] for the base.
thanks to: [b]anybody that has written a guide/tutorial for PI bases[/b] [/center]
[b]Recent Updates:[/b]
[ul][li]learned to spawn NPC's , add shops , add drops and such[/li] [li]added 8 dungeons to the Chaos Dungeons and fake portals[/li] [li]increased rarity of rare items[/li] [li]fixed the prayer reset to 94 glitch / bug[/li] [li]made a fountain that heals you and restores prayer to max ( all by myself , no tuts used :D)[/li] [li]connected all the skilling areas[/li] [li]added agility[/li] [li]didn't feel like adding lunar , but i got vengeance propped into the regular spellbook , check the images( it still requires the runes and 94+ mage)[/li] [li]only 2 teleports per spellbook , home and skills , boses have to be gotten to by the Chaos Dungeons , minigames and PK zones will be handled in the quest tab[/li] [li]found out how to change the quest names in the quest tab and how to give them commands all by myself ;D :cool: :D[/li] [li]added the hitmarks of the 562[/li] [li]the enchanted gem will let you receive a slayer task anywhere.( it is also a rare )[/li] [li][b]Techraeyel[/b] , a new boss , has been added. he will be the boss monster of the chaos dungeons as he can hit 99's. he can also attack with magic , ranged and melee , so he is more of a challenge then any other monster. i'm currently adding drops to it , raredropratio will be 1/10 because of its dificulty... he is [b]not[/b] a custom NPC , i took the models of a black demon and used them for him.[/li][/ul]
[b]ToDo - List[/b]
[ul][li]add NPC's to Chaos Dungeons[/li] [li]add drops to NPC's[/li] [li]add treasure chests[/li] [li]fix duel arena glitch ( where people lose all their stuff ) ( DFS glitch + forfeit glitch )[/li] [li]make it impossible to ' lure ' the GWD bosses with magic / ranged[/li] [li]PK points and PK shops ( need help with that... )[/li] [li]fix all of the dupes[/li][/ul]
[b]Upcoming Update:[/b] working on SoulSplit prayer with its healing effect ( snippet is 95% done , just have to tweak on it...)
i will update this thread with anything i add to the server , hope you guys like it. also , if you guys could give me your thoughts on this server , i would appreciate it... [b]pictures:[/b] [b]New Hitmarks[/b] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/newhitmarks.jpg?t=1283184552[/img] [b]Vengeance in regular spellbook[/b] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/vengeance.jpg?t=1283184599[/img] [b]enchanted gem gives and changes slayer task[/b] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/enchantedgem.jpg?t=1283352584[/img] [b]shop area[/b] [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz247/Musa_Kapan/shops.jpg?t=1283548887[/img]

item.title: Devion's Realm , my first server
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“vipercross, post:7, topic:355987”]nice and gl with your server
i need help fixing the 94 reset pray glitch if you could[/quote]
sure , openup clickingbuttons.java
find ( ctrl + f ) turmoil

you should find this:

			case 70094: // turmoil
			c.getCombat().activatePrayer(25);
			c.playerLevel[5] = 95;
			c.gfx100(1224);
			c.startAnimation(3926);
			break;

erase this line:

			c.playerLevel[5] = 95;

and that’s it.

Read full topic

item.title: Devion's Realm , my first server
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Supsup you guys?
Most of you don’t know me ,
that’s because i’m fairly new at all this coding stuff.
I started coding about 1 month ago.

anyways , lets get to the credits and such…

[center]
here’s the base’s information:
Base used: Exion’s PI Base
Protocol: 317

Credits:
I Am Sanity and
Exion for the base.

thanks to:
anybody that has written a guide/tutorial for PI bases
[/center]

Recent Updates:

[ul][li]learned to spawn NPC’s , add shops , add drops and such[/li]
[li]added 8 dungeons to the Chaos Dungeons and fake portals[/li]
[li]increased rarity of rare items[/li]
[li]fixed the prayer reset to 94 glitch / bug[/li]
[li]made a fountain that heals you and restores prayer to max ( all by myself , no tuts used :D)[/li]
[li]connected all the skilling areas[/li]
[li]added agility[/li]
[li]didn’t feel like adding lunar , but i got vengeance propped into the regular spellbook , check the images( it still requires the runes and 94+ mage)[/li]
[li]only 2 teleports per spellbook , home and skills , boses have to be gotten to by the Chaos Dungeons , minigames and PK zones will be handled in the quest tab[/li]
[li]found out how to change the quest names in the quest tab and how to give them commands all by myself ;D :D[/li]
[li]added the hitmarks of the 562[/li]
[li]the enchanted gem will let you receive a slayer task anywhere.( it is also a rare )[/li]
[li]Techraeyel , a new boss , has been added.
he will be the boss monster of the chaos dungeons as he can hit 99’s.
he can also attack with magic , ranged and melee , so he is more of a challenge then any other monster.
i’m currently adding drops to it , raredropratio will be 1/10 because of its dificulty…
he is not a custom NPC , i took the models of a black demon and used them for him.[/li][/ul]

ToDo - List

[ul][li]add NPC’s to Chaos Dungeons[/li]
[li]add drops to NPC’s[/li]
[li]add treasure chests[/li]
[li]fix duel arena glitch ( where people lose all their stuff ) ( DFS glitch + forfeit glitch )[/li]
[li]make it impossible to ’ lure ’ the GWD bosses with magic / ranged[/li]
[li]PK points and PK shops ( need help with that… )[/li]
[li]fix all of the dupes[/li][/ul]

Upcoming Update:
working on SoulSplit prayer with its healing effect ( snippet is 95% done , just have to tweak on it…)

i will update this thread with anything i add to the server , hope you guys like it.
also , if you guys could give me your thoughts on this server , i would appreciate it…
